attributes.action: Don't privatise Channel 4. Keep it is a public asset.
attributes.additional_details: Channel 4 is a national asset and should be preserved. The government should not privatise Channel 4. From Come Dine With Me to Countdown, Gogglebox to Father Ted, publicly owned Channel 4 has kept us entertained and informed since 1982.
attributes.background: Channel 4 is commercially run, funded by advertising revenue. It should remain publicy owned.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
